description.value: An extension that mimics the default FHIR `MedicationDispense.category` element that can be used if multiple categories need to be captured. The zib profile fixes a zib definition code to `category` thereby denying the use for other purposes because of its 0..1 cardinality.

definition.value: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).
